extendedInfo.description: MAME & NEO-GEO emulator with full tilt control support and online scoreborad, featuring some new gameplay elements for classic arcade games. This is emulator only, you need to PROVIDE YOUR OWN ROMs.Lousy touchscreen, no more. Perhaps somewhat surprisingly g-sensor turns out to be far more accurate and responsive, which makes it, with some practice of course, quite adequate input method for many classic arcade games. Crazy Tilt substitutes these arcade inputs:* 2-way vertical for games like Pooyan * 2-way horizontal for games like Moon Patrol or Galaga * 4-way digital for games like Pac-Man or Donkey Kong* 4-way diagonal for games like Q*bert* 8-way digital for games like Gyruss or Time Pilot* various analog for games like Star Wars or Paperboy* steering wheel for driving games like Out Run or Hang-On* trackball for games like Marble MadnessConsequently some games now have new gameplay mechanics, for example - run by shaking the phone in Track & Field and Hyper Sports. But beside accelerometer support for mobile gaming we also aim to make it compatible with external controllers and arcade cabinets by providing additional PAL/NTSC options for connection to CRT or LCD display.*** TEST BUILD *** TEST BUILD ***Classic Arcade Crazy Tilt ChallengeStumbled over some bug and wish it would be fixed? Describe it and name your device. Would like to see some game supported? Let us know. Online scoreboard server is currently up for these games (testing): commando digdug dkong elevator gyruss mpatrol mrdo pacman popeyebl scramble timeplt yiear + amidaru crush frogger jjack kicker pingpong pooyan Media Volume can be adjusted while MENU is upMENU->Settings to redefine input & set other optionsMENU->LogIn to play official game and upload your recordsBACK is default button for 'Insert Coin' and 'Game Start' menuVOLUME UP & DOWN is default mapping for Button1 and Button2Specific Game Notes...Out Run- shift gears up with Button3, shift gears down with Button2 + Button3, can be redefined Metal Slug - Button1 + Button2 can be used instead of Button3Star Wars & Empire Strikes Back- move the aim around screen edges to calibrate analog inputFrogger- to jump press Button1 while tilting in some direction at the same timeYie Ar Kung-Fu- for special 3rd button combinations hold Button1 + Button2General Emulator Notes...In case accelerometer doesn't seem to be responding try changing options in "Angle and Sensitivity" settings menu. Press Button1 + Button2 + START to access in-game MAME menu. Supported games: amidaru commando congo crush digdug dkong dkongjr elevator esb frogger galaga gng gyruss hyperspt imsorry jjack junofrst kicker mappy marble mario mpatrol mslug mrdo outrun pacman paperboy phoenix pingpong pooyan popeyebl qbert scramble shangonb starwars timeplt trackfld wboy yiear zookeep*** TEST BUILD *** TEST BUILD ***
